title: 'Clean sheet mentality' key in Rohl's Rangers revival
summary: Another win and another clean sheet for Rangers as they stay on the coattails of Scottish Premiership leaders Hearts, with manager Danny Rohl hailing the team's "outstanding development".

title: Murphy & Selby lose on thrilling Masters first day
summary: Reigning champion Shaun Murphy and current UK title holder Mark Selby are both eliminated on a thrilling opening day of the Masters at London's Alexandra Palace.

title: 'They'd take him back in a heartbeat' - Welbeck haunts Man Utd again
summary: Veteran striker Danny Welbeck haunts former club Manchester United again and now calls for an England call-up are only going to rise.

title: Ulster awarded win from Cheetahs postponement
summary: Ulster are awarded a 28-0 win and maximum points as the European Professional Club Rugby (EPCR) confirmed Sunday's Challenge Cup match against the Cheetahs in the Netherlands will not be rescheduled.

title: 'Fragile' Man Utd set for fewest games in season since 1914-15
